item.title: Jason add a quote by Terry Goodkind
item.description: "People are stupid. They will believe a lie because they want to believe it's true, or because they are afraid it might be true." -- Terry Goodkind

item.title: Jason add a quote by Barack Obama
item.description: "Yes We Can!" -- Barack Obama

item.title: Jason add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Keep your thoughts positive because your thoughts become your words. Keep your words positive because your words become your behavior. Keep your behavior positive because your behavior becomes your habits. Keep your habits positive because your habits become your values. Keep your values positive because your values become your destiny." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Jason add a quote by Stephen Richards
item.description: "When you do what you fear most, then you can do anything." -- Stephen Richards

item.title: Jason add a quote by Stephen Richards
item.description: "The only time you fail is when you fall down and stay down." -- Stephen Richards

item.title: Jason add a quote by Stephen Richards
item.description: "The true measure of success is how many times you can bounce back from failure." -- Stephen Richards

item.title: Jason add a quote by Michael Jordan
item.description: "Always turn a negative situation into a positive situation." -- Michael Jordan

item.title: Jason add a quote by Ellen DeGeneres
item.description: "It makes a big difference in your life when you stay positive." -- Ellen DeGeneres

item.title: Jason add a quote by Rick Steves
item.description: "Be fanatically positive and militantly optimistic. If something is not to your liking, change your liking." -- Rick Steves

item.title: Jason add a quote by Milton Erickson
item.description: "I have no intention of dying. In fact, it will be the last thing I do!" -- Milton Erickson

item.title: Jason add a quote by T.F. Hodge
item.description: "Elevate your inside game. A negative attitude is below the horizon...a place for lonesome hearts." -- T.F. Hodge

item.title: Jason add a quote by Henrik Edberg
item.description: "If you see the world and yourself through a lens smudged by negativity then you’ll find much misery. If you look outwards and inwards through lens brightened by positivity you’ll find much to be happy and appreciative about." -- Henrik Edberg

item.title: Jason add a quote by Stephen Richards
item.description: "Happy people produce. Bored people consume." -- Stephen Richards

item.title: Jason add a quote by Stephen Richards
item.description: "Before you can successfully make friends with others, first you have to become your own friend." -- Stephen Richards

item.title: Jason add a quote by Stephen Richards
item.description: "If you think you can then you can." -- Stephen Richards

item.title: Jason add a quote by Stephen Richards
item.description: "Each new friend gives rise to the possibility of anything!" -- Stephen Richards

item.title: Jason add a quote by Stephen Richards
item.description: "We were all born equal, but where we are in life now is of our own making." -- Stephen Richards

item.title: Jason add a quote by Stephen Richards
item.description: "Unless you know where you are going then you will not know how to get there." -- Stephen Richards

item.title: Jason add a quote by Steve Backley
item.description: "Success is a decision, not a gift." -- Steve Backley

item.title: Jason add a quote by Stephen Richards
item.description: "One who swims with the tide and not the other side will benefit from the opportunity that flows." -- Stephen Richards

item.title: Jason add a quote by Stephen Richards
item.description: "If you do not have persistence then no amount of education, talent or genius can make up for it." -- Stephen Richards

item.title: Jason add a quote by Steve Backley
item.description: "The thrust of continuous action is the firewood which fuels motivation." -- Steve Backley

item.title: Jason add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "For every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Jason add a quote by Marthe Troly-Curtin
item.description: "Time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time." -- Marthe Troly-Curtin

item.title: Jason add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Jason add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "Folks are usually about as happy as they make their minds up to be." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Jason add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "Happiness in intelligent people is the rarest thing I know." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Jason add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Jason add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Jason add a quote by Thomas A. Edison
item.description: "I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work." -- Thomas A. Edison
